thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Sabrina Abu-Taah
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Sabrina Abu-Taah

author: Sabrina Abu-Taah
title: Sabrina Abu-Taah
text: I received my water filter system in the mail and it arrived promptly and intact. The installation was easy and took about 10 minutes from start to finish. The filter instantly made the water soft and my skin felt so smooth. I got the shower head and filter combination in chrome. It looks really sleek, but the product is only plated chrome. If you don't mind the white version, it will save you money and is the same quality as the chrome. Other than that it is a great product.
